text: Hello guys, I want the property of total discount in the quote api, I am not able to find the name. can anyone help?

Is there a way to push code to custom code in workflow directly from the command line ? Something like `hs` ? I have a rather complicated codebase that has to be run in a single custom code. I would like to use some codes from different files and bundle them to push to the custom code. Have you got some idea to make the whole process smoother and safer ?
